price: ពិតប្រាកដណាស់ អល់ឡោះជាអ្នកផ្ដល់លាភសក្ការៈដែល មានអានុភាពខ្លាំងក្លាជាទីបំផុត។
arabic: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ هُوَ ٱلرَّزَّاقُ ذُو ٱلۡقُوَّةِ ٱلۡمَتِينُ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: inna al-laha huwa al-razāqu dhū al-quwati al-matīnu
